description: The XML deserialiser handles the older deprecated auto_disk_config but not OS-DCF:diskConfig attribute which causes rebuild/resize action setting that option to fail if passed using XML rather than JSON
title: XML deserialiser doesn't handle OS-DCF:diskConfig resize and rebuild actions

comments.content: The XML deserialiser handles the older deprecated auto_disk_config but not OS-DCF:diskConfig attribute which causes rebuild/resize action setting that option to fail if passed using XML rather than JSON
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/24011
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/24011
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/02c7cd97fa4b8a81f0795be757bd99a29a037795
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 02c7cd97fa4b8a81f0795be757bd99a29a037795
Author: Christopher Yeoh <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Mar 10 15:43:19 2013 +1030

    Fix more OS-DCF:diskConfig XML handling
    
    Add handling in the deserialisation code to handle the
    OS-DCF:diskConfig attribute in the rebuild and resize actions so
    the diskConfig extension can handle it properly. Formerly only
    the older auto_disk_config attribute was managed (and incorrectly so).
    
    Fixes bug 1153133
    
    Change-Id: I68479d258cf23083274dd21b1f9eabab2feeb093
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
